text: Centronia is a genus of plants in the family Melastomataceae. Species include: * Centronia brachycera (Naudin) Triana * Centronia laurifolia D.Don * Centronia mutisii (Bonpl.) Triana * Centronia peruviana J.F.Macbr. Category:Melastomataceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Centronia
